Import your subscriptions from YouTube, by first visiting https://www.youtube.com/subscription_manager, and clicking the \"Export Subscriptions\" button at the bottom. Then, select the xml file you exported by clicking \"Select XML File\" below.
No YouTube channels were found in the XML file you uploaded.
